[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Candidates” module_class=”page-hero-template” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_text_align=”center” title_text_color=”#29295b” title_font_size=”40px” subhead_text_align=”center” subhead_text_color=”#777e84″ subhead_font_size=”15px” background_enable_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”rgba(255,255,255,0)” background_color_gradient_end=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_overlays_image=”on” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/armchairs-blur-business-296883.jpg” custom_padding=”165px||165px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”96px||96px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”66px||66px||true|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” title_font_size_tablet=”” title_font_size_phone=”30px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”45px||45px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_text_color=”#ae4542″ header_font_size=”37px” header_line_height=”1.2em” header_text_align_tablet=”center” header_text_align_phone=”center” header_text_align_last_edited=”on|phone” header_font_size_tablet=”32px” header_font_size_phone=”18px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

We have your next job – right here.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#29295b” text_font_size=”21px” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone”]Pursuing your career goals is exciting; but at the same time, matching your skills and lifestyle to the right job is a challenge.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#ffffff” background_color_gradient_end=”#e9edee” background_color_gradient_direction=”90deg” background_color_gradient_start_position=”25%” background_color_gradient_end_position=”21%”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/scientific-staffing-meeting-planning-session.jpg” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ box_shadow_style=”preset1″ box_shadow_blur=”19px” box_shadow_spread=”1px”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_padding=”47px||||false|false”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”21px” width_tablet=”70%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”1.7em” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” module_alignment_tablet=”right” module_alignment_phone=”” module_alignment_last_edited=”on|phone”]

ClinLab Staffing will match you with the right pharmaceutical or biotech position – quickly and easily. Focusing exclusively on the life sciences, we work closely with some of the biggest names in the industry and have positions available from Entry-Level Lab Technicians to Senior Directors and Principle Scientists.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#29295b” header_line_height=”1.3em” header_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_font_size_phone=”20px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone”]

Whether you’re searching for a temporary or permanent position, we offer:

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″]

  • The respect and personal attention you deserve. You’re more than a “skill set” to us – you’re the most important component of our success, and we treat you accordingly.
  • The specialized opportunities you need. We know the life sciences industry and only offer the right projects and positions for you. Challenging opportunities with dynamic companies that move your career forward.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_image src=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/lab-testing-3.jpg” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”off|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ custom_margin=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”off|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”0px||0px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.1″ text_text_color=”#ae4542″ text_font_size=”25px” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”71px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”13px||34px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” hover_enabled=”0″ text_font_size_tablet=”21px” text_font_size_phone=”19px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height=”1.8em”]ClinLab Staffing: Recruiting & Staffing Services for the Life Sciences Industry[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Get Started Today:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%264%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#29295b” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_line_height=”1.7em”]

  • Search scientific jobs
  • Send your resume to info@clinlabstaffing.com
  • Call us at 508-907-6222

[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_blurb title=”Contractor Benefits:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%169%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#29295b” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_line_height=”1.7em”]

  • Health and dental insurance after 90 days of employment
  • COBRA continuation coverage
  • Accrued holiday and vacation pay
  • A company-matching 401(k) plan

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_blurb title=”Project-Based and Direct Opportunities for:” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%103%%” icon_color=”#ffffff” use_circle=”on” circle_color=”#29295b” icon_placement=”left” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ header_font=”|600|||||||” header_line_height=”1.7em”]

  • Laboratory Technician
  • Research Associate
  • Scientist
  • Principal Scientist
  • QA/QC Specialists
  • Document Control Specialist
  • Process Development Scientist
  • Manufacturing Specialist
  • Manufacturing Engineer
  • Lab Manager
  • Supervisor, Manager, and Director-Level Candidates
  • Clinical Trial Managers
  • Clinical Research Associates
  • Clinical Data Managers
  • SAS Programmers
  • Biostatisticians
  • Medical Writer
  • Regulatory Affairs

[/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.1″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”Work with a recruiter who speaks your language – and puts your needs first.” text_orientation=”center” header_fullscreen=”on” button_one_url=”/contact-life-science-staffing/” background_overlay_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.61)” content_max_width=”72%” content_max_width_tablet=”100%” content_max_width_phone=”” content_max_width_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.4.1″ title_font=”|700||on|||||” title_font_size=”42px” title_line_height=”1.6em” subhead_font=”||||||||” subhead_text_color=”#add8eb” subhead_font_size=”26px” subhead_line_height=”1.4em” background_enable_color=”off” background_image=”https://clinlabstaffing.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/temp-workers-and-company-culture.jpg” parallax=”on” custom_button_one=”on” button_one_text_size=”16px” button_one_text_color=”#29295b” button_one_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_one_border_width=”0px” button_one_border_radius=”0px” button_one_font=”|||on|||||” button_one_use_icon=”off” button_one_custom_padding=”8px|28px|8px|28px|true|true” module_alignment=”center” link_option_url=”/contact-life-science-staffing/” title_font_size_tablet=”28px” title_font_size_phone=”24px” title_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” title_line_height_tablet=”” title_line_height_phone=”” title_line_height_last_edited=”on|tablet” subhead_font_size_tablet=”21px” subhead_font_size_phone=”” subhead_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” button_one_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_one_bg_color__hover=”#add8eb” button_one_bg_enable_color__hover=”on”][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section]

meta._et_pb_old_content:
We have your next job – right here.

Pursuing your career goals is exciting; but at the same time, matching your skills and lifestyle to the right job is a challenge.

ClinLab Staffing will match you with the right pharmaceutical or biotech position – quickly and easily. Focusing exclusively on the life sciences, we work closely with some of the biggest names in the industry and have positions available from Entry-Level Lab Technicians to Senior Directors and Principle Scientists.

Whether you're searching for a temporary or permanent position, we offer:

  • The respect and personal attention you deserve. You're more than a "skill set" to us – you're the most important component of our success, and we treat you accordingly.
  • The specialized opportunities you need. We know the life sciences industry and only offer the right projects and positions for you. Challenging opportunities with dynamic companies that move your career forward.

Work with a recruiter who speaks your language – and puts your needs first.

ClinLab Staffing: Recruiting & Staffing Services for the Life Sciences Industry

Get Started Today:

  • Search Scientific jobs
  • Send your resume to info@clinlabstaffing.com
  • Call us at 508-907-6222

Contractor Benefits

  • Health and dental insurance after 90 days of employment
  • COBRA continuation coverage
  • Accrued holiday and vacation pay
  • A company-matching 401(k) plan

Project-Based and Direct Opportunities for:

  • Laboratory Technician
  • Research Associate
  • Scientist
  • Principal Scientist
  • QA/QC Specialists
  • Document Control Specialist
  • Process Development Scientist
  • Manufacturing Specialist
  • Manufacturing Engineer
  • Lab Manager
  • Supervisor, Manager, and Director-Level Candidates
  • Clinical Trial Managers
  • Clinical Research Associates
  • Clinical Data Managers
  • SAS Programmers
  • Biostatisticians
  • Medical Writer
  • Regulatory Affairs
